hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OLDER_THAN_DAYS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter a number; all scan data folders older than that number of days will be deleted.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash #set -x cd /var/jenkins_home/workspace/security-verification-scan/sv echo; echo "Files/folders of /var/jenkins_home/workspace/security-verification-scan/sv" ls -lat echo; echo "Cleaning these folders" find ./ -maxdepth 1 -type d -mtime +$OLDER_THAN_DAYS -print | grep -E "[a-fA-F0-9]{8}-([a-fA-F0-9]{4}-){3}[a-fA-F0-9]{12}-[0-9]{15}" ds=$(find ./ -maxdepth 1 -type d -mtime +$OLDER_THAN_DAYS -print | grep -Eo "[a-fA-F0-9]{8}-([a-fA-F0-9]{4}-){3}[a-fA-F0-9]{12}-[0-9]{15}") for d in $ds; do rm -rf $d done echo; echo "Remaining files/folders of /var/jenkins_home/workspace/security-verification-scan/sv" ls -lat
